General.Name: Jarvis Securities
General.Description: Jarvis Securities plc, through its subsidiary, Jarvis Investment Management Limited, provides stock broking services to retail and institutional clients in the United Kingdom. The company offers retail execution-only stockbroking services; nominee, certificated, SIPP, and ISA accounts; savings schemes; and outsourced financial administration services to investment firms. It also provides Model B clearing and settlement services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Royal Tunbridge Wells, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 78 Mount Ephraim, Royal Tunbridge Wells, United Kingdom, TN4 8BS
